title: SALEM EPISODE 3: A ‘new Jerusalem’ on the edge of a wilderness
itunes:title: SALEM EPISODE 3: A ‘new Jerusalem’ on the edge of a wilderness
itunes:subtitle: In 1692, Salem was a colonial outpost teetering on the edge of a precipice. In this episode we’ll explore what life was like in the New England settlement, and consider whether environmental pressures
description:
In 1692, Salem was a colonial outpost teetering on the edge of a precipice. In this episode we’ll explore what life was like in the New England settlement, and consider whether environmental pressures – from the threat of attack to an inhospitable climate – could have played a role in the outbreak of accusations of witchcraft.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
